Detailed Description

Represents a single coordinate-angle pair included in a InfoCoordinateRequestPacket.

Definition at line 25 of file InfoCoordinatePacket.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

InfoCoordinate::InfoCoordinate (   )  [inline]
 

Default constructor.

Sets the member variable coord to the default value for a MC2Coordinate, and the angle member variable to MAX_INT32.
